title: The Howl of Noxus Mission Bug
body:
Whenever you complete both objectives of the mission the mission itself doesn't complete.
I've had two games where I've won against a Demacian champion AND won my third game and the mission doesn't finish.

https://imgur.com/kYjC63r

replies.body:
No, the bug exists but it is not centered around "meeting both objectives". I have a 4th Mission where I have to either "win a game with a Noxian champ on team", or "Win 2 ARURF games", did not complete for me when I won 2 Normal Summoner's Rift games with Noxian champs (1st game: Riven; 2nd game, Talon, Darius, and me playing Cassio).

So no, the bug exists, but its triggered, or present because of another factor.

Just GREAT.... will loose much valuable blue and orange essence because I'm going on Vacations to the wilds in 2 days. Thanks RITO again for removing IP Points and replacing them with something that requires mine constant participation in every event you throw at us, just to get that new champ.
same here I finished 2missions (8th and 7th for 2times)(eu west)12hours its a bit late
I am having the same issue. I have won 2 games, one in aram and one in draft, both under 30 mins, and I did not get credit for either part of this mission.
